title: Group portrait of scholarship recipients, seated, from left: Mary Jane Allen, Dorothy Gloster, Barbara Pitts, representing Thomas Pitts; Marcia Hord, representing Horrace Hord; Mattie Pinkney, Carole VeLar, and Gloria Williams; standing, from left: Edgar Golden, representing Joseph Golden; Henry Peyton, representing Emmitt Lee; Eugene Roberts, Cleo Walker, representing Gloria Walker; Delores Mach, representing Clifford Mack; Arenzo Smith, Wendell Smith, and Clarence Burleigh, gathered on lawn for Metoka Club garden party
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
